> <OLD - Nightlight>
>
> Nigthlight didnt say a word and she had a hard time to contains her tears
> and she said soflty "Are you... sure that Elita is safe in this place? I
> dont want to think what will happen when Magmatron call me... Or what will
> happen when you will be absent of base"

<NEW>

DARK RODIMUS stopped his pacing as NIGHTLIGHT spoke, his optics
fastening on her, their glow dimming somewhat as her words penetrated.
"You might have a point." He said finally as he crossed his arms over
his chest.

"Perhaps the little one will be safe where she is. I am sure Kup will
look after her or maybe Elder." He said gruffly as he rubbed his chin
thoughtfully, the sameme way that the old RODIMUS used to do when he
was thinking hard about something.

"As long as that fool of a leader Tuscon isn't doing it." he said as
he turned to look at NIGHTLIGHT and smiled, "But at least you are here
with me my sweet."

(TAG)

Preston
